California decile for the ratio, available for places (geotype=PL).  Deciles are for each strata level separately
column7: CA_decile' groups California places into 10 groups (or deciles) each, for total population. Equal values or 'ties' are assigned the mean decile rank. For example, in a database of 100 records where 70 records equal 0, 0 values span from the 1st to 7th deciles (70% of all data records).
